title: [Gameplay] Singed fling not working
body: Singed fling was not flinging people behind him, only knocking them up in place. There were no walls blocking shit either.

replies.body: They said they now about this issue and many others when they disabled nid and kass but don't care about fixing it. Alot of toons have game altering bugs, I think rito just faps to these complaints.
It has been around for a while and RIOT FAILS to do anything about it. I don't even own singed, but my WW bug still exists =(
I noticed this earlier in a match against a Swain while playing Singed. The Swain only knocked up instead of being flung behind Singed.
